REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f0665 reute r f BC-ALLTEL-<AT>-DEBENTURE 03-05 0086

TEXT.TITLE: ALLTEL <AT> DEBENTURES YIELD 8.90 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Alltel Corp is raising 50 mln dlrs through an offering of debentures due 2022 yielding 8.90 pct, said lead manager Merrill Lynch Capital Markets. The debentures have an 8-7/8 pct coupon and were priced at 99.726 to yield 135 basis points over the off-the-run 9-1/4 pct Treasury bonds of 2016. Non-callable for five years, the issue is rated A-3 by Moody's Investors Service Inc and A by Standard and Poor's Corp. Stephens Inc co-managed the deal. Reuter
